level.text: Violation of the following provision shall be a Class 1 infraction:
22 DCMR § 3203.1 (operating a nursing facility without a license).
Violation of any of the following provisions shall be a Class 2 infraction:
22 DCMR § 3200.1 (failure to comply with requirements concerning a provision in the federal regulations);
22 DCMR § 3205 (failure to comply with requirements concerning insurance coverage);
22 DCMR § 3207 (failure to comply with requirements concerning physician services and medical supervision);
22 DCMR § 3208 (failure to comply with requirements concerning nursing services and Director of Nursing);
22 DCMR § 3209 (failure to comply with requirements concerning nursing services supervision);
22 DCMR § 3210 (failure to comply with requirements concerning licensed nursing coverage);
22 DCMR § 3211 (failure to comply with requirements concerning nursing personnel);
22 DCMR § 3212 (failure to comply with requirements concerning temporary nursing personnel);
22 DCMR § 3213 (failure to comply with requirements concerning restorative nursing care);
22 DCMR § 3215 (failure to comply with requirements concerning ventilator care services);
22 DCMR § 3216 (failure to comply with requirements concerning use of restraints);
22 DCMR § 3217.6 (failure to ensure that infection control policies are implemented and that environmental services are in compliance);
22 DCMR § 3217.8 (failure to report communicable disease);
22 DCMR § 3222 (failure to comply with requirements concerning immunizations);
22 DCMR § 3223 (failure to comply with requirements concerning rehabilitative services);
22 DCMR § 3224 (failure to comply with requirements concerning pharmaceutical services and supervision);
22 DCMR § 3225 (failure to comply with requirements concerning physician orders for medications);
22 DCMR § 3226 (failure to comply with requirements concerning administration of medication);
22 DCMR § 3227 (failure to comply with requirements concerning labeling and storage of medication);
22 DCMR § 3235.5 (failure to provide emergency power generator when life support system is used);
22 DCMR § 3235.6 (failure to provide emergency power for elevators); or
22 DCMR § 3236.4 (failure to maintain water temperature between 95 and 110 degrees Fahrenheit).
Violation of any of the following provisions shall be a Class 3 infraction:
22 DCMR § 3201 (failure to comply with requirements concerning administrative management);
22 DCMR § 3202 (failure to comply with requirements concerning personnel policies);
22 DCMR § 3203, except § 3203.1 (failure to comply with requirements concerning licenses and administrative records);
22 DCMR § 3206 (failure to comply with requirements concerning resident care policies);
22 DCMR § 3214 (failure to comply with requirements concerning in-service education for nursing personnel);
22 DCMR § 3217, except § 3217.6 and § 3217.8 (failure to comply with requirements concerning infection control);
22 DCMR § 3218 (failure to comply with requirements concerning dietary supervision);
22 DCMR § 3219 (failure to comply with requirements concerning dietary services);
22 DCMR § 3220 (failure to comply with general dietary requirements);
22 DCMR § 3221 (failure to comply with requirements concerning dietary management and records);
22 DCMR § 3228 (failure to comply with requirements concerning podiatry services);
22 DCMR § 3229 (failure to comply with requirements concerning social services);
22 DCMR § 3230 (failure to comply with requirements concerning resident activities);
22 DCMR § 3231 (failure to comply with requirements concerning medical records);
22 DCMR § 3232 (failure to comply with requirements concerning incident reporting);
22 DCMR § 3233 (failure to comply with requirements concerning grievances);
22 DCMR § 3234 (failure to comply with environmental requirements);
22 DCMR § 3235, except § 3235.5 and § 3235.6 (failure to comply with requirements concerning electrical systems);
22 DCMR § 3236, except § 3236.4 (failure to comply with requirements concerning water supply and distribution);
22 DCMR § 3237 (failure to comply with requirements concerning sewage and solid waste disposal);
22 DCMR § 3238 (failure to comply with requirements concerning heating and cooling);
22 DCMR § 3239 (failure to comply with requirements concerning ventilation and exhaust);
22 DCMR § 3240 (failure to comply with requirements concerning acoustical insulation and noise reduction);
22 DCMR § 3241 (failure to comply with requirements concerning elevators);
22 DCMR § 3242 (failure to comply with requirements concerning walls, ceilings, floors and finishes);
22 DCMR § 3243 (failure to comply with requirements concerning ramps, stairs, and corridors);
(aa) 22 DCMR § 3244 (failure to comply with requirements concerning outdoor space);
(bb) 22 DCMR § 3245 (failure to comply with requirements concerning nursing unit design);
(cc) 22 DCMR § 3246 (failure to comply with requirements concerning resident bedrooms);
(dd) 22 DCMR § 3247 (failure to comply with requirements concerning resident toilets and bathrooms);
(ee) 22 DCMR § 3248 (failure to comply with requirements concerning refreshment stations);
(ff) 22 DCMR § 3249 (failure to comply with requirements concerning resident recreation and social areas);
(gg) 22 DCMR § 3250 (failure to comply with requirements concerning food service areas);
(hh) 22 DCMR § 3251 (failure to comply with requirements concerning therapy service areas);
(ii) 22 DCMR § 3252 (failure to comply with requirements concerning resident shopping and grooming areas);
(jj) 22 DCMR § 3253 (failure to comply with requirements concerning public and staff facilities);
(kk) 22 DCMR § 3254 (failure to comply with requirements concerning laundry areas);
(ll) 22 DCMR § 3255 (failure to comply with requirements concerning housekeeping and maintenance);
(mm) 22 DCMR § 3256 (failure to comply with requirements concerning housekeeping and maintenance services);
(nn) 22 DCMR § 3257 (failure to comply with requirements concerning pest control);
(oo) 22 DCMR § 3258 (failure to comply with requirements concerning general safety and inspection);
(pp) 22 DCMR § 3259 (failure to comply with requirements concerning fire and emergency preparedness);
(qq) 22 DCMR § 3264 (failure to comply with requirements concerning physical structure and construction); or
(rr) 22 DCMR § 3265 (failure to comply with requirements concerning wheelchair and handicapped access).
